description: I place the second KERDI-BOARD on the first panel and tap it against the valve. That marks the valve location and I use the mixing valve seal to trace my pencil outline. Then I cut the board with a sharp utility knife. Don't forget, when you join our Video Library today you'll get our Beginner Walk-In Shower Plumbing Course for free at https://homerepairtutor.com/platinum-membership/
title: How to Cut KERDI-BOARD Around Shower Valves - #shorts #homerepairtutor
